intro.content: Kids have too many pieces in their treehouse.
And some kids don't have enough pieces!
Let's use our superhero powers of SCIENCE.

sarah_choose_level.content: Tap on a treehouse to start fixing!

sarah_map_welcome.content: I can Help! Tap on a treehouse to start fixing!

onboarding_build_shelf.content: Let's use all the blocks we have to re-build this treehouse.

onboarding_build_success.content: Our roof stayed on. Our treehouse is stable.

onboarding_build_welcome.content: Hmmm... Something isn't right about this treehouse. Let's investigate.

onboarding_drag_block_3.content: First, drag the block to the tree.

onboarding_drag_repeat.content: Move the block over to the tree.

onboarding_fix_success.content: The treehouse is stable, and the recycling meter is full.

onboarding_fix_welcome.content: Hmm... This treehouse has too many blocks in it. Let's fix it.

onboarding_help.content: Hmm... Looks like my treehouse isn't balanced. Let's fix it.

onboarding_last_block.content: One last block! Remember, we have to use all the blocks.

onboarding_mulcher.content: The treehouse stayed up! And look! The recycling meter moved up!

onboarding_needs_more.content: Looks like this treehouse needs some more pieces.

onboarding_remove_1.content: Tap on a block to remove it from the treehouse.

onboarding_remove_2.content: Let's take out another block to fill up the meter.

onboarding_roof_1.content: Tap the roof to test the treehouse.

onboarding_roof_2.content: All our blocks are stable. Now we can put on the roof.

onboarding_rotate_block.content: Now, tap the arrow to turn it until it matches.

onboarding_rotate_intro.content: Hmm... Doesn't seem like this block will fit anywhere nicely.

onboarding_simulate_1.content: All right! Now, let's see if that block will stay.
Tap the test button to find out.

onboarding_simulate_2.content: Let's test the new block to see if it's stable.

onboarding_simulate_3.content: Let's test the block we turned to see if it's stable.

onboarding_simulate_4.content: All right. Now the block is in the recycling bin.
Let's test how the treehouse stands up without that block.

onboarding_simulate_5.content: Do you think the treehouse will stand up without this block?

onboarding_undo.content: Tap the undo button to bring back things that fall out of the tree.
